name: ultimate-jekyll
description: Ultimate Jekyll starter project including full setup for gulp, Sass, Autoprefixer, PostCSS, webpack, imagemin, Browsersync etc.

scripts._start: bundle exec gulp clean:jekyll && bundle exec gulp
scripts.dist: git add . && git commit -m 'Published pages' && git push origin
scripts.wm:prod: npm uninstall web-manager && npm i web-manager --save-dev --save-exact
scripts.clean:jekyll: bundle exec gulp clean:jekyll && npm run preinstall
scripts.clean:npm: rm -fr node_modules && rm -fr package-lock.json && npm cache clean --force && npm install && npm rb && bundle exec gulp clean:npm
scripts.template:update: bundle exec gulp template:update && npm install
scripts.template:setup: git checkout master && git remote add upstream https://github.com/itw-creative-works/ultimate-jekyll.git && git remote set-url --push upstream no_push && git fetch upstream template && git merge upstream/template --allow-unrelated-histories -m "Merge from template." && npm install

author: ITW Creative Works

noteDeps.browser-sync: 2.23.7 (6-22-2023): Hard lock because every version after uses socket.io@4.7.0 which uses engine.io@6.5.0 which is incompatible with node 10.15.1 due to TextDecoder() in build process
noteDeps.sharp: 0.23.1 (sometime before 2021ish): Hard lock because later versions had issues. Possibly solved in higher node versions
